Title: Former Avon CEO to run Grameen America
Description: NEW YORK — The former head of Avon is now leading Grameen America, a group that provides small loans to poor women entrepreneurs in the U.S. Andrea Jung was CEO of the beauty products company from 1999 through April 2012 and served as chairman through ...

Title: A tale of 2 US employment surveys, at a glance
Description: The U.S. economy added 192,000 jobs in March, a respectable gain that would typically be enough to lower the unemployment rate. Yet the rate was unchanged at 6.7 percent. Why did the unemployment rate remain the same if the job gain was solid? Because the ...

Title: Miners, retailers lead Aust stocks to 1% weekly gain
Description: The Australian sharemarket gained over one per cent for the week thanks to strong performances from miners and retailers, but US stocks left it with a negative lead for the week ahead. The benchmark S&P/ASX200 index lifted 55.9 points, or 1.04 per cent, to ...

Title: Big pay bump for Blankfein
Description: Goldman Sachs Group delivered its top executive his biggest paycheck in six years. Lloyd Blankfein, Goldman's chairman and CEO, received $US23 million ($A24.9m) in salary and bonus for his 2013 performance. He is also eligible to earn another $US6m if the ...
